title: Lets All Chef - Food marketplace and recipe ideas
description: It's a food service platform that suggests, orders and guides you to make recipes. Smart companion for home cooks and professional chefs. Accomplish more in the kitchen with what you have.

title: Familia - Family tree & contacts manager
description: Contact details, house details, relations and events manager for family.

title: EasyHome - Device dashboard
description: Control and monitor home devices with ease using NodeMCU. User-friendly home automation dashboard with REST API support.

title: Black Fire - NodeJS web application framework
description: NodeJS web app framework using Express, NodeJS and MongoDB. NodeJS

title: Sparkle - Developer resources.
description: Useful and genuine resources for developers added and maintained by developers. Built with jekyll and hosted on GH-Pages.

title: Sanz - Jekyll blog template
description: Minimal and responsive jekyll powered website & blog templates optimized for GH-Pages.

title: QuickDocs - API documentation template.
description: Easy to setup API documentation template using Jekyll and Semantic UI.

title: MindPrick - Accademics re-imagined
description: Students, syllabus, previous year question papers, time-table, attendance, feedback manager and lot more.

title: Nalettes - Nature inspired color palettes
description: Repository of color palettes picked up carefully, inspired from nature.

title: Chain Reaction - Web clone of popular android game.
description: Popular android game Chain Reaction written in HTML, CSS & JS

title: Wind Spinner - Emulation using OpenGL
description: Wind Spinner emulation in C language using OpenGL library.
